1200 watts with 30-second fast heat-up and powerful steam output dewrinkles your clothes in no time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Water Tank Transparent Detachable 260ml/8.79oz water tank for easier filling and 15 minutes of uninterrupted steaming. Extra-Long Power Cord An ultra-long 8ft/2.4m cord provides maximum reach and convenience. Plus, every single steamer cable is rigorously tested for maximum safety and durability. 3 Additional Attachments Lint Brush: Removes lint from garmentsSoft Brush: Cleans visible dust from deep inside fabricCreaser: For maintaining perfect pleats and folds

No Leaking, No Spilling Pump-steam technology allows steam of clothes whether hanging vertically or lying flat. Ready in 30 Seconds Your time is valuable, so don’t waste it! Just plug it in and be ready to steam in 30 seconds or less. Safety Features Automatic shut-off when over-heated or after 8 minutes of inactivity.

Mini Heat Press Machine Mini Steam Iron Steam Iron Dual Voltage Steamer Foldable Garment Steamer Product Dimensions 4.9x2.8x4.1 inches 5.3x3x3.1 inches 11.4x5.9x4.7 inches 8.85x7.08x3.81 inches 8.3x4.5x2.8 inches Item Weight 1.1 pounds 1.1 pounds 2.5 pounds 1.9 pounds 1.4 pounds Wattage 300 W 400 W 1500 W 1200 W 1000 W Voltage 120V 110V/230V 120V 100-240V 120V Reservoir Capacity 1.4oz 11.8oz 4.8oz 5.07oz Heat Up 60 seconds 35 seconds 60 seconds 35 seconds 30 seconds Ironing Result A+ A+++ A+ A+

Note In order to ensure the quality of the product, our company's quality control staff generally uses distilled water to fully test each equipment to make sure our products work. Therefore, some residual water from testing might remain in the unit or the water tank, which is normal for the process and does not mean customers have received a previously used steamer. It does not influence the use of the products.Only for 120 volts outlet use. Plugging into 220 volts will damage this product.If you receive the product without an intact seal, please contact service team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Most hand held devices have a small container to place your water. The device is amazing, heated really quickly, no spills and left my clothes wrinkle free regardless of the fabric. I used filtered water and it got the job done. I had the Conair which cost me almost $60 but it had specific instructions on maintenance and the type of water to use. I had to buy vinegar and distilled water to clean it. It did last me a few years until it was spitting water and dirty water... which constantly required more maintenance. After cleaning the Conair with vinegar again it started spitting hot water and then stopped steaming. I had to get a new one since the Conair stopped working after I had it several years. I must say this apparatus gets the job done and quickly. It's affordable and it works. I'm a Prime member so I got next day delivery which worked out cause I needed to steam my clothes for a job interview plus my Conair stopped working

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This a great steamer with lots of nice features. It heats up very quickly, produces lots of hot steam, is easy to use the auto button so you don't have to keep holding it down, plus you never have to worry about water dripping out no matter the angle you use it at. The two things I'd say the manufacturer could improve on are with the water container - 1) you fill it upside down yet the markings are right side up so you have to eyeball what the maximum water level should be - maybe include markings the other way so it's easier to fill the to proper level? 2) I was able to steam about 4-5 shirts at a time so a larger water capacity tank would be a nice upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was Great Then Stopped Working--Follow-up--Great Customer Service!
reviews.reviewText: Follow-up to my original review: After I left my 1-star review, the manufacturer contacted me and offered a full refund. I accepted the offer, and then used that money to buy another one at a lower price, since it happened to be Prime Days. So those are both good things! As originally stated, I liked this steamer until it stopped working. So I am going to revise to 4 stars. The one star off is because I stand by the fact that this should not be essentially disposable. I'm going to donate my broken one to a kid who is learning how to repair things, and wants broken items to tinker with. Otherwise, it's a lot of plastic that doesn't need to go into a landfill.Here is my original review: I was so happy with this steamer. I got it to replace my previous, smaller, travel steamer that I had decided was too small. I liked this because the reservoir was relatively large, the ease of use, the functionality, etc. I loved that I could steam an entire multi-piece suit or outfit without having to stop and change the water. It heated up fast. It worked really well with a great steam flow and never spit. I liked that the steam button could be locked for continuous steam. It's a little large for travel, but still packable. However...it suddenly stopped working after I steamed half a shirt the other day! After that, it would turn on, but just leak water from around the push button and wouldn't heat up to steam anymore. I bought it in March, so I'm outside the return window. If I had had this for 5 years, it would be one thing for it to stop working. But 6.5 months and about 8 uses makes it a waste of money and a lot of material to go to a landfill for what is essentially a disposable product. Now I'll go back to my previous travel steamer that I have been using for 15 plus years. Annoyed. Aarrrggghhh!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works as advertised and EXCELLENT customer support
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer September 2022, and only had used it a couple times (I don’t have a ton of clothes that I need to steam). When I went to use it in August 2023, it wasn’t working correctly. It would heat up but steam wouldn’t come out (I didn’t have this experience before). I reached out to this company’s customer support via email. Within a day or two I got a reply with some troubleshoot tips. I tried those and still had no luck getting it to steam. The gal I emailed with asked for my address to send a replacement. I had a new steamer within one week. They replaced this item I’ve had for almost a year because there is a 24 month warranty. Their customer support team made this incredibly fast and easy. So friendly and helpful too! I was thoroughly impressed!! This company truly backs their product! As for the steamer itself, works like a champ! Not sure what the issue was with my last one…but either way, my new steamer works great! As advertised, you can hold it upright or horizontally like an iron. Heats up super fast, like a couple minutes. It will dribble/spit out a couple drops of water every now and then, but it isn’t an issue as it’s only water and not ruining anything! It does make like a continual clicking sound when you’re holding down the steam button. It doesn’t bother me, and I didn’t even notice after a while. If you struggle with sensory overload issues, then you might not like the noise this product makes. It’s not loud, and like I said it didn’t bother me at all. Just wanted to mention it as that might be important to some people. I was able to steam 4 shirts on my first fill of the water chamber. With more practice, I’m sure I could do more than 4, as I’m kinda slow getting back into using a steamer. Also, had some shirts with odd fabric that were stubborn, so that took a little more time. No issues with stopping from overheating either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, good price
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these for my sister as a gift and she liked it so much that she told me I had to get one for me! I have had this steamer for about a year, and it works great. I use ONLY distilled water, and I like that it has a metal plate that you can use to iron as you steam. As you can see, these thick curtains had some really deep wrinkles and the steamer took care of them in a snap! It gets really hot and is portable if you need it for travel.P.S. I'm not being paid for this review. I just really like my steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Way better quality than my last one! I’ve had this for a few years and never had an issue. Easy to use and heats up fast

I've been very happy with this purchase so far. I haven't used any of the attachments but I've used the steamer several times already. Heats up very very fast. The water compartment releases and installs quite easily. Nice amount of steam emitted. Ergonomically it feels good to use. The cord is quite long which is very helpful. Overall really happy with this as long as it stands the test of time!

reviews.reviewTitle: The Ultimate Steamer – Fast, Affordable, and Pro-Level!
reviews.reviewText: The BEAUTURAL 1200-Watt Handheld Steamer has become my absolute favorite among the various steamers I've tried. This little gem not only comes at a great price but delivers performance that rivals professional-grade steamers.One of its standout features is the lightning-fast 30-second heat-up time. No more waiting around – this steamer gets the job done swiftly, making it perfect for those busy mornings or last-minute touch-ups. The ease of handling is remarkable, and it truly feels like a pro-level tool in my hands.I appreciate the thoughtful design and simplicity of this steamer. While I personally don't use the extra attachments frequently, they are a nice addition to have, providing versatility for different fabrics and garments. It's a testament to the thoughtful engineering behind this product.The 8.79-ounce water tank strikes a great balance, offering enough capacity to tackle multiple garments without feeling cumbersome. The convenience and efficiency of the BEAUTURAL steamer have made my daily routine smoother and more efficient.If you're looking for a reliable, fast-heating, and reasonably priced handheld steamer, look no further. The BEAUTURAL 1200-Watt Handheld Steamer has exceeded my expectations and earned its place as my go-to garment care tool. Highly recommended for anyone who wants quality without breaking the bank!
Amo esta steamer! Dejé de usar plancha desde que la compré y no podría estar más feliz con ella

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i use this all the time for shirts and dresses! it works really well and is so easy to use and literally takes seconds

reviews.reviewTitle: It doesn't support Indian power sockets because of its High voltage power intake.
reviews.reviewText: Don't buy if you're using it in India. The first product recieved had a problem with the adaptor, it was completely burnt in the first attempt only. I got a replacement with complete new product but again in the first use only the internal electronic circuit of the product got burnt as shown in picture. Now because my return window is closed I had to end up with a loss.
